mapper.select: SELECT username, password, email, email_verified as emailVerified, email_verification_token as emailVerificationToken FROM member WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT username, password, email, email_verified as emailVerified, email_verification_token as emailVerificationToken FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT username, password, email, email_verified as emailVerified, email_verification_token as emailVerificationToken FROM member WHERE email_verification_token = #{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, password, email, email_verified, email_verification_token) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{emailVerified}, #{emailVerificationToken})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET email_verified = #{emailVerified}, email_verification_token = null WHERE username = #{username}
